attributes.action: Allow childcare level 3 to have predicted grades and no exams
attributes.background: Allow students who study childcare to get their predicted grades and no have to sit the exams

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for how grades for specific vocational courses are granted, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615

Allow teacher predicted grades for NVQ/VRQ qualifications so it is fair: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567340
